763590.name: TY the Tasmanian Tiger 2 Soundtrack
763590.description:
The music from TY the Tasmanian Tiger 2, from the original composer, George Stamatiadis, with a medley of tracks from the second game in the series. (MP3s)

TY the Tasmanian Tiger 2 Bush Rescue OST Steam Edition

  • Burramudgee Town
  • Bush Rescue HQ
  • Attack On Currawong
